BEER BEER BEER!!!
At The Foundry, we pride ourselves on having the most beer taps on the northern shores of Lake Superior. We carry a wide selection from all over Ontario. Including local brews from Sleeping Giant, Dawson Trail, Lake of the Woods, and Slate Island Brewing Co.; in addition to breweries like Leftfield, Burdock, and Wildwoods. We boast over 20 different beers at a time. Whether you're having lunch, dinner, or enjoying a show, an ice-cold beer fits perfectly in your hand.
